title: PM to address nation today: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 19 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain Monday announced that Prime Minister Imran Khan would address the nation today.
He said this on his twitter handle.
وزیر اعظم پاکستان عمرا ن خان آج قوم سے خطاب کریں گے
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) April 19, 2021
